This service monitors app usage and blocks apps when screen time limits are exceeded. It helps parents control their children\'s device usage.

NetGuard Kids App Blocking Service

 This service monitors when blocked apps are opened and prevents access to them. It helps parents control which apps their children can use by automatically redirecting to a blocking screen when restricted apps are launched.

 The service only monitors app launches and does not collect or store any personal data.
